## RemirrorProvider variable

The RemirrorProvider which injects context into it's child component.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
RemirrorProvider: {
    <GExtension extends import("@remirror/core").Extension<any, any> = any>({ children, childAsRoot, ...props }: RemirrorProviderProps<GExtension>): JSX.Element;
    $$remirrorType: RemirrorType;
}
```

## Remarks

This only supports one child. At the moment if that that child is an built in html string element then it is also treated as the

These can either be consumed using React Hooks - `useRemirrorContext` - `usePositioner`
